products.title: Chateau Blockout Cool Beige Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their cool beige colour - a tone that is perfect as a neutral colour. Product id: sdb-pfp0161 fabric colour: cool beige material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes chateau blockout cool beige solar/thermal perfect fit pleated blind in cream.
